title: 15m queue for champion select bug
body:
I play ranked and am using the standard client.

Two or three times today I have effectively dodged champion select because an error has occurred while banning a champion. I hit the ban button and a dialogue box addressing the error has popped up. I have now been hit with 5 games low priority queue which last 15 minutes each. That will be a good hour and a half matchmaking added.

It seems unfair given that I didn't make the client. 

May you lift me from low priority queue please? I will have 4 clocks left.
Will there be an update to sort this out? Yo thank you if so.

It will be a problem if I am perma low priority queue'd.

ta

replies.body:
Rest assured that you won't be hit with any kind of "permanent" low priority queue! We won't be able to do much about leaverbuster's here on the boards, but I _can_ help you figure out what happened when you couldn't click that ban.

You probably couldn't click ban in time because of something making your connection with our servers unstable. Let's be sure to cover all our bases by going through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Be sure to test any of those changes in a custom game to prevent that LPQ!
